name: PA?ACE
description:
DESCRIPTION

Being surrounded by a familiar place that you could call home for the entirety of your life can turn out to not feel as comforting and intimate as you would think it should, at almost any given moment. 

Come along on this journey to find out what causes this sudden feeling and what lies beneath the reasonings for it.

Be sure to watch your back,

But don't forget to see ahead of you.

Uncover the mysteries but don't get too lost within them.

And of course, don't forget to eventually find your way out.

CONTROLS AND GAME MECHANICS

a - move left

s - crawl

d - move right

left shift - sprint

left arrow - scan left

bottom arrow - scan left and right

right arrow - scan right

space - go inside the door, open drawer, open closet, open exit

Your goal for the game is to find a key and then open the exit door. The Key can be found in drawers and closets inside the room. You are safe inside the rooms.

There are four monsters which are going to make your life harder, here are their descriptions in a nutshell: Paralyze (tall red guy) - stop moving or you die, Fisherman (sits on a closet) just don't touch it or crawl under it, Mimic (looks like the main character, Cecil) - run, Marathoner (You don't wanna see him) - hide in a room or you die. The exit door is much larger than a normal door

GitHub repository: https://github.com/RDMchik/PALACE/tree/master

Game play: 

DON'T USE main.py!!! USE main.exe INSTEAD!!!

IF THE GAME GETS FROZEN JUST CLICK ON THE SCREEN
